title: Postpartum Hemorrhage Simulation Training: Instructional Design-Based Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic obstetrics and gynecology knowledge and emergency response skills
context.additional_context: A large-scale educational program in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment, focusing on improving practical skills through language-integrated simulation training

learning_goals: Perform over 10 core clinical tasks in postpartum hemorrhage simulation scenarios with 90% accuracy.
Utilize team-based communication protocols to deliver effective emergency reports within 3 minutes.
Repeat simulation training in 15-minute intervals three times weekly via smartphone-based microlearning modules.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
